name: Cleanink Windows - DEMO
description:
Help Dave clean the building's windows.

Wanted to do 5 or more levels and a final boss but ran out of time.

Move with arrow keys. Hear the sound (bug: it plays all the sound from the column), and guess if it is good. If you think it's good, press space to clean it. If you find an enemy, attack it by clicking it.

Maybe in some time i'll continue this game.

Made with Scratch 3.0.

Music: freemusicarchive.org
